errors.error_description: The dependency installation command incorrectly refers to `requirements_dev.txt`, a file that does not exist in the repository, instead of the correct `requirements.txt`.
correction_candidates: Change the filename in the command from `requirements_dev.txt` to `requirements.txt`.
Change the filename in the command from `requirements_dev.txt` to `requirements_full.txt`.
Instruct the user to rename the `requirements.txt` file to `requirements_dev.txt` before running the command.
Change the command to `pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements_full.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the filename in the command from `requirements_dev.txt` to `requirements.txt`.
